author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: What to watch today: Dow set for huge jump after rocketing 1,600 points higher
description: Dow futures were pointing to a big gain at Tuesday's open a day after President Donald Trump expressed hope about research for treatment of the coronavirus
content: Trump, at Monday evening's White House coronavirus briefing, said that 10 therapeutics are in active trials. Fifteen other potential treatments are "advancing rapidly" toward clinical trials, he added. Trump also said, "Stay inside and let's win this and let'… [+4437 chars]
